extendedInfo.description: If you love the corner of the hearth and spend quality time with your family, you will surely love this fascinating Family Poems app. Download this cool app to serenade your family members and let them understand how much you cherish and value their closeness in your life. This Android app has been created with precision and sentiments to make sure that you identify with the emotions of intimacy!The appâs features include:â¢	Short family poemsâ¢	Inspirational family poemsâ¢	Famous family poemsâ¢	Family poems for kidsCelebrate your loved ones with the quotes from family poems! DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is collected using Feeds and Videos are hosted by YouTube and all are available in public domain. We have not uploaded any videos to YouTube. Apps are fetching the data from RSS feeds of different sites.This app provides an organized way to browse, read contents and watch YouTube Videos.
